REQUEST_OPTION.description: Request helper options for internal requests.

KEEP_ALIVE.description: Add Keep-Alive header to the request connection.

CALENDAR_API_KEY.description: The API Key that the Calendar uses to resolve scopes. This should be removed with SC-3387

CALENDAR_URI.description: The URI to the Calendar Service

CONSENT_AGE_FIRST.description: First gate for consent. Starting at this age the user have to give his/her consent

CONSENT_AGE_SECOND.description: Second gate for consent. Starting at this age parent consent is not required

DISABLED_BRUTE_FORCE_CHECK.description: To disabled the brute force prevention hooks for by authentication.

LOGIN_BLOCK_TIME.description: Time difference for the brute force check in seconds

FORCE_SEND_EMAIL.description: Send mails to mail service, also if not in production mode

FALLBACK_LANGUAGE.description: Value for the fallback language if translation key is not found

SYNC_API_KEY.description: The API Key that the Sync and Mail Cron-Job uses to authenticate itself.This should be removed with SC-3387

TEACHER_VISIBILITY_FOR_EXTERNAL_TEAM_INV.description: defines wheter external team invitation shows teachers from different schools or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by user required.

STUDENT_TEAM_CREATION.description: defines wheter students may create teams or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by school admin required.

REDIS_URI.description: URL of a Redis server. If undefined, JWT whitelisting and timeouts will be disabled. Format: [redis[s]:]//[[user][:password@]][host][:port][/db-number][?db=db-number[&password=bar[&option=value]]]

PIN_MAX_AGE_SECONDS.description: Maximum time in seconds a generated pin is handled as valid.

JWT_LIFETIME.description: Lifetime of generated JWTs in days.

JWT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.description: After this many seconds of inactivity, a user gets logged out automatically. If no REDIS_URI is set, this value is ignored.

FEATURE_JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_ENABLED.description: Using privateDevice parameter in login, the logout/jwt timeout can be extended to JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_SECONDS instead of JWT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.

JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.description: After this many seconds (default is one month) of inactivity, a user gets logged out when accepted extended login duration. If no REDIS_URI is set, this value is ignored.

TSP_API_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: The key used to encrypt/decrypt TSP request tokens.

TSP_API_SIGNATURE_KEY.description: The key used to sign/verify TSP request tokens.

BLOCK_DISPOSABLE_EMAIL_DOMAINS.description: Prevent use of disposable email addresses.

ADDITIONAL_BLACKLISTED_EMAIL_DOMAINS.description: Add custom domain to the list of blocked domains (comma separated list).

FEATURE_TSP_AUTO_CONSENT_ENABLED.description: Feature toggle for automatic consent during TSP sync.

FEATURE_VIDEOCONFERENCE_ENABLED.description: If enabled, adds video conferences to teams and courses.

VIDEOCONFERENCE_DEFAULT_PRESENTATION.description: Link to a custom presentation, if empty, the default presentation will be used.

VIDEOCONFERENCE_HOST.description: The BBB base url (should end without a slash).

VIDEOCONFERENCE_SALT.description: The BBB Salt for api call checksum creation.

NO_COLOR.description: The value is used to disable logging color in terminal and is set in production always to true. It is not connected to the loggers it self.

FILES_STORAGE.description: Files storage server properties, required always to be defined

SERVICE_BASE_URL.description: The URI of the file service

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout for incoming requests to the Files-Storage in milliseconds.

MAX_FILE_SIZE.description: Maximum file size for incoming requests in Byte. We use the Windows convention here that file sizes are measured in KB (1KB = 1024B, instead of 1kB = 1000B). Thus 2,5GB = 2684354560B.

S3_ENDPOINT.description: The URI of the S3 provider

FWU_CONTENT.description: Properties of the S3 storage containing FWU content

S3_ENDPOINT.description: The URI of the S3 provider

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Timeout for incoming requests to the fwu-learning-contents in milliseconds.

FEATURE_FWU_CONTENT_ENABLED.description: Defines if backend for the FWU content in the Learnstore is enabled.

FEATURE_H5P_EDITOR_ENABLED.description: Defines if backend for the H5P editor is enabled.

WOPI_MAX_FILE_SIZE.description: The maximum file size in bytes that can be handled by the WOPI API. Download of larger files throws an error.

FEATURE_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT_ENABLED.description: Enables the Identity Management (ErWIn IDM) feature.

FEATURE_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT_STORE_ENABLE.description: Enables the Identity Management (ErWIn IDM) as account storage.

FEATURE_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT_LOGIN_ENABLE.description: Enables the login via OIDC with the Identity Management (ErWIn IDM) for users managed by dBildungscloud.

OIDCMOCK.description: OpenID Connect Identity Provider mock server for develop and testing purpose (set these values for local seeding purpose).

CLIENT_ID.description: The mock server accepted client id.

CLIENT_SECRET.description: The mock server accepted client's secret.

RABBITMQ_URI.description: The URI of the RabbitMQ server.

HOST.description: The client url (should end without a slash).

API_HOST.description: The server endpoint, for external calls like Antivirus service. When called from docker container, can be http://host.docker.internal:3030

PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL.description: The server api url that is accessible from the web (should end without a slash).

ALERT_STATUS_URL.description: The url of status message provider (should end without a slash).

NEXBOARD_API_KEY.description: The nexboard api key for sending requests.

FEATURE_MULTIPLE_S3_PROVIDERS_ENABLED.description: Enables using the storage provider collection to determine a provider with free buckets upon school creation. If disabled, the only storage provider is configured via the environment variables in config/secrets.js

S3_KEY.description: Synchronous encryption key used to secure storage provider secrets. Only used with FEATURE_MULTIPLE_S3_PROVIDERS_ENABLED=true

FEATURE_S3_BUCKET_CORS.description: true if CORS is supported by the S3 bucket. (Minio does not support it)

REQUEST_LIMIT_STORAGE_PROVIDER.description: Number of objects that can be modified in one request to the storage provider. Must not exceed 1000.

STORAGE_SIGNED_URL_EXPIRE.description: Expiration time in seconds for signedUrl used by antivirus

FILE_SECURITY_CHECK_SERVICE_URI.description: Antivirus file endpoint, only used for legacy file implementation

FILE_SECURITY_SERVICE_USERNAME.description: Username for the antivirus service, only used for legacy file implementation

FILE_SECURITY_SERVICE_PASSWORD.description: Password for the antivirus service, only used for legacy file implementation

FEATURE_LOGIN_LINK_ENABLED.description: Login via Link generation (to the right form).

FEATURE_SCHOOL_SANIS_USER_MIGRATION_ENAB.description: Enables the oauth system (iserv to sanis) migration feature.

MIGRATION_END_GRACE_PERIOD_MS.description: Grace period before school admin cannot restart oauth migration anymore. Value is given in ms and default is 7 days

SC_SHORT_TITLE.description: Look to SC_TITLE, it is a possible short form of it.

FEATURE_ADMIN_TOGGLE_STUDENT_LERNSTORE_V.description: Allows school admin to toggle student's LERNSTORE_VIEW permission.

IS_CONFIGURABLE.description: Allows school admin to toggle teachers' STUDENT_LIST permission.

IS_ENABLED_BY_DEFAULT.description: Grants teachers STUDENT_LIST permission by default.

FEATURE_SCHOOL_POLICY_ENABLED.description: Custom School Policy can be uploaded by the school admin

ROCKETCHAT_SERVICE_ENABLED.description: Enables chat function for the school.

LDAP_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Synchronous encryption key used to secure search user passwords

AES_KEY.description: Symetric encryption key used to encrypt and decrypt secrets.

ETHERPAD_API_KEY.description: The etherpad api key for sending requests.

ETHERPAD_COOKIE__EXPIRES_SECONDS.description: Number of seconds after an etherpad cookie expires.

ETHERPAD_ETHERPAD_COOKIE_RELEASE_THRESHO.description: If Session Valid time is smaller than this, a new session is created on request.

NEXTCLOUD_SOCIALLOGIN_OIDC_INTERNAL_NAME.description: Internal name of schulcloud oidc provider of nextcloud's social login app

COLLABORATIVE_STORAGE_PROVIDER.description: Selects the storage provider strategy for the collaborative storage

SKIP_CONDITIONS_CONSENT.description: A string with concatenated user types (student, employee) that don't need to explicitly state their consent with the terms and conditions. "employee" means teachers and admins.

ACTIVATION_LINK_PERIOD_OF_VALIDITY_SECON.description: The time in seconds during which the activation link is valid. After expiration the entry is removed from the database

ADMIN_MAIL_RECEIVERS.description: A string that contains recievers of the daily stat and other mails. Can contain mutliple mails, seperated by comma

FEATURE_LERNSTORE_ENABLED.description: Defines if backend for the Lern-Store Edu-Sharing is enabled.

ES_DOMAIN.description: The URL for the edu-sharing repository.

ES_USER.description: The username for edu-sharing api access

ES_PASSWORD.description: The password for edu-sharing api access

ES_API_V7.description: Use the newer API for Edusharing v7

FEATURE_ES_MERLIN_ENABLED.description: When enabled, the merlin referene will generate a valid url

SECRET_ES_MERLIN_USERNAME.description: The username for Merlin login, used for edusharing

SECRET_ES_MERLIN_PW.description: The password for Merlin login, used for edusharing

SECRET_ES_MERLIN_COUNTIES_CREDENTIALS.description: JSON stringified with credentials for merlin counties, used by Lern-Store

FEATURE_ES_SEARCHABLE_ENABLED.description: When enabled, only content having searchable flag will be returned by Lern-Store

FEATURE_ES_COLLECTIONS_ENABLED.description: When enabled, collections will be searchable in Lern-Store

SILENT_ERROR_ENABLED.description: Brute force flag during recovery password process

FEATURE_API_VALIDATION_ENABLED.description: when enabled, all incoming requests are validated against the openapi schemata, unless the route is whitelisted.

FEATURE_API_RESPONSE_VALIDATION_ENABLED.description: when enabled, all incoming requests are validated against the openapi schemata, unless the route is whitelisted.

API_VALIDATION_WHITELIST_EXTENSION.description: when set, this is interpreted as a regex to extend the ignorelist for the API validation with any routes matching the regex.

FEATURE_PROMETHEUS_ENABLED.description: Enable prometheus api metrics, if enabled, PROMETHEUS must be defined.

FEATURE_MONGOOSE_LOGGING_ENABLED.description: Enable logging for mongoose database calls.

PROMETHEUS.description: Prometheus metrics options used by prometheus-api-metrics

DURATION_BUCKETS_SECONDS.description: Times to define buckets by seconds which contain all requests with max. the given amount of time. Must be in ascending order.

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_API.description: Timeout for incoming requests to the API in milliseconds.

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_COPY_API.description: Timeout for incoming requests to the copy API in milliseconds.

FEATURE_SYNC_LAST_SYNCED_AT_ENABLED.description: Enable setting/updating user's document lastSyncedAt field, e.g. in the LDAP sync process

FEATURE_SYNCER_CONSUMER_ENABLE.description: Enable consumer for queued sync messages

LDAP_SYSTEM_SYNCER_POOL_SIZE.description: Determines how many system syncers will be run in parallel (at most) during the LDAP sync.

LDAP_SCHOOL_SYNCER_POOL_SIZE.description: Determines how many school syncers will be run in parallel (at most) during the LDAP sync.

SYNC_LOG_LEVEL.description: Log level for queue based syncers (e.g. LDAP)

NEST_LOG_LEVEL.description: Nest Log level for api. The http flag is for request logging. The http flag do only work by api methods with added 'request logging interceptor'.

MAIL_SEND_ROUTING_KEY.description: Routing key name for mail sending

MEMORY_INTERVAL_TIME.description: Is the time for logging memory metrics to log in >secounds<. Default 0 will disable the logging.

REQUEST_LOGGING_ENABLED.description: Enabled that every request is logged with the information route and method

JWT_AUD.description: It is the organisation web point that is created the jwt and where questions can addressed.

SUPPORT_PROBLEM_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Email address used for reporting a problem

SUPPORT_WISH_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Email addresses used for reporting a wish

JWT_SHOW_TIMEOUT_WARNING_SECONDS.description: Determines the time in seconds to show the timeout warning in the client

FEATURE_EXTENSIONS_ENABLED.description: Enables user's use of extensions in the client

FEATURE_TEAMS_ENABLED.description: Enables user's use of the teams feature in the client

NOT_AUTHENTICATED_REDIRECT_URL.description: Determines the url to be redirected to when the user is not authenticated

FEATURE_COURSE_SHARE_NEW.description: Toggle for the new course sharing feature.

FEATURE_TASK_SHARE.description: Toggle for the task sharing feature.

FEATURE_USER_MIGRATION_ENABLED.description: Enable user migration page for admin to bind ldap accounts to local accounts

FEATURE_USER_MIGRATION_SYSTEM_ID.description: SystemId for migration of users from system. To use this please set FEATURE_USER_MIGRATION_CENTRAL_LDAP in the client

FEATURE_IMSCC_COURSE_EXPORT_ENABLED.description: Toggle for the IMSCC course download feature.

GHOST_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of ghost blog (should end without a slash)

FEATURE_CONSENT_NECESSARY.description: Determines if consent is necessary during registration.

COOKIE.description: Cookie properties, required always to be defined

SAME_SITE.description: Value for cookies sameSite property. When SECURE flag is false, 'None' is not allowed in SAME_SITE and Lax should be used as default instead

SESSION.description: Cookie properties, required always to be defined

SAME_SITE.description: Value for session cookies sameSite property. When SECURE flag is false, 'None' is not allowed in SAME_SITE and Lax should be used as default instead

SECURE.description: Value for session cookies httpOnly property

HTTP_ONLY.description: Value for session cookies httpOnly property

PROXY.description: Trust the reverse proxy when setting secure cookies (via the X-Forwarded-Proto header)

SECRET.description: This is the secret used to sign the session cookie.

FEATURE_ALLOW_INSECURE_LDAP_URL_ENABLED.description: Enables feature that allows the insecure LDAP URL (with ldap:// protocol).

FEATURE_NEW_SCHOOL_ADMINISTRATION_PAGE_A.description: Makes the new school administration page the default page

FEATURE_CLIENT_USER_LOGIN_MIGRATION_ENAB.description: Changes the schulcloud client to use new login endpoints

FEATURE_CTL_TOOLS_TAB_ENABLED.description: Enables new CTL-tool tab in a course

FEATURE_LTI_TOOLS_TAB_ENABLED.description: Enables old LTI-tool tab in a course

STUDENTS_TEACHERS_CLASSES_LIMIT.description: Number of simultaneously synchronized students, teachers and classes
